name: miceblocks
label: Miceblocks Resource Pack
description: Miceblocks is a resource pack I worked on during 2020. This project literally changed my life!

textContent.title: How it began
textContent.text: Well, it's hard for me to even get started. Miceblocks changed my life, like... literally. I don't remember exactly what started my desire to make a resource pack for Minecraft, I think I always wanted to work on a project, whatever it was. Of cource, I chose the easiest thing to work with, a simple and not-so-ambitious Minecraft texture pack based on oCd pack. You ask me today, Miceblocks is a very boring texture pack.
